item.title: Python Pandas API Oddities
item.description: This post uses the Delta Airlines Airports Wikipedia HTML table as an example to highlight some niche functions in Python's pandas library. I skipped the standard must know functions like pd.read_csv() and pd.read_excel(). I use those all the time. This is aimed at the more advanced stuff on â€¦
